message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $180.
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit high for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $150?

I understand that $180 is a bit high, but I've got to make a profit. I can do $165 for the product. It's the lowest I can go, but I think it's a fair price considering the quality and value it offers.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $165 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $155?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I still think the product is worth more than $155. I can meet you halfway at $160, but that's as low as I can go.
I understand that you're getting close to your minimum price, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $155 again?

I've already made it clear that I won't go below $160, and you've already offered me $155 twice. I'm starting to think we're not going to meet in the middle. I'm willing to compromise a bit more, so I'll meet you at $158. That's my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $158 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $152?
